title: FS:  Old Mill T206 Ads - Savannah Morning News 1910  - **  Offers considered
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  Old Mill T206 Ads - Savannah Morning News 1910  - **  Offers considered
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I recently came across a large lot of Old Mill Cigarettes T206-related ads.  These were all taken from the Savannah Morning News during the spring of 1910.

I have 19 different scenes.  Each measure approximately 5 x 7.  Each shows a "southern scene" of one sort or another along with a box of Old Mill Cigarettes with 2 T206s and an Old Mill coupon coming out of the top.  Each also notes "Baseball pictures and a valuable coupon in each package."

Of the various scenes, some might be considered a bit racially charged.

Scans of each are shown below.  I am asking $30 each for these.  

Thank you.  Please PM me (and add an email address if you want a scan) or email me directly at [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url]

Happy Collecting,
Craig

BUMP

If you'd like one or all, please feel free to make an offer.  Thanks much.
